alert.note: Alert for Lee; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Union, northern Lee, southeastern Tippah and southwestern Prentiss Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keownville, or 7 miles east of New Albany, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Albany, Baldwyn, Guntown, Keownville, New Harmony, Blair, Dumas, Blue Springs, Graham, Jericho, Branyan, Ellistown, Jug Fork, Baker, Geeville, Locum, Union Hill, Wallerville, Alpine and Blackland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
